name: honorable-recipe-gap
description: A gapping solution recipe for honorable

scripts.test:watch: nodemon --watch src --watch tests --ext ts,tsx,snap --exec "npm run test"
scripts.dev: npm run clean:build && nodemon --watch src --ext ts,tsx --exec "npm run build"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
